item.title: The Tao of UX/UI Design
item.description:
As a developer

  1. TALKING TO YOUR TEAM — WHAT EXACTLY ARE YOU BUILDING? In general, the first point of contact a web development team will have with a UX designer or design team is when a new product feature, or even a new product, is proposed for implementation. When this feature …
item.dc:creator: Marina von Steinkirch
